item.title: 六个月过去了，特朗普的大多数交易终于有了回报
item.description:
股票和比特币创下历史新高，大多数债券收益率走低

。【原文：

Stocks and Bitcoin are at records, and most bond yields are lower

】

item.title: 华尔街顽固看好低迷的能源股
item.description: 华尔街分析师对石油和天然气类股票寄予厚望，因为估值便宜，而且唐纳德-特朗普总统对陷入困境的能源行业大加鼓励。【原文：Wall Street analysts have high hopes for oil and gas stocks, encouraged by cheap valuations and President Donald Trump’s boosterism of the beleaguered energy sector.】

item.title: 中国开展检查以制止煤炭生产过剩
item.description: 中国政府警告说，它可能会关闭产量超过许可水平的煤矿，这是监管机构开始认真控制各行业产能过剩的最新迹象。【原文：The Chinese government warned it may shutter coal mines guilty of producing above permitted levels, in the latest sign that regulators are getting serious about reining in overcapacity across industries.】

item.title: 指控俄罗斯干预的前议员在欧洲人权法院败诉
item.description: 欧洲最高人权法院驳回了三名前立法者提出的法律挑战，裁定英国政府没有因未能调查俄罗斯干预选举的指控而侵犯选民的权利。【原文：The UK government didn’t breach voters’ rights by failing to investigate alleged Russian interference in elections, Europe’s top human rights court ruled, rejecting a legal challenge brought by three former lawmakers.】

item.title: 印度必须警惕低价钢铁倾销，JSW 称
item.description: 印度最大的金属生产商之一 JSW 钢铁有限公司的联合总经理 Jayant Acharya 表示，印度需要警惕廉价进口钢材可能涌入该国。【原文：India needs to be vigilant against cheap imports of steel that may flood the country, according to Jayant Acharya, joint managing director of JSW Steel Ltd., one of the country’s biggest producers of the metal.】

item.title: 泰国表示即将与美国达成降低 36% 出口关税的协议
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）表示，泰国即将与美国达成协议，在8月1日的最后期限之前降低美国威胁对泰国出口征收的36%的关税，他预计贸易谈判将在几天内结束。【原文：Thailand is close to an agreement with the US to lower a threatened 36% tariff on its exports ahead of the Aug. 1 deadline, according to Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira, who expects trade talks to conclude within days.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行竞购 BPM 银行接近尾声，截止日期为周三
item.description: 在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购 Banco BPM SpA 八个月后，Andrea Orcel 的时间不多了。【原文：Eight months after UniCredit SpA made its move on Banco BPM SpA, time is running out for Andrea Orcel.】

item.title: 中国投资者抢购香港股市，资金流入接近创纪录水平
item.description: 中国内地投资者购买香港上市股票的数量正接近创纪录的年度水平，推动了香港股市的上涨，使香港的一个重要基准成为全球表现最好的股票之一。【原文：Mainland Chinese investors’ purchase of Hong Kong-listed stocks is approaching an annual record, driving a rally that has made a key benchmark in the city one of the world’s best performers.】

item.title: 为什么 "反胁迫 "工具是欧盟不得已而为之的贸易武器？
item.description: 欧盟在贸易争端中拥有一个强大的工具，但它希望永远不需要使用这个工具。【原文：The European Union has a powerful tool to wield in trade disputes that it hopes it will never need to use.】

item.title: 西班牙停电事故可能导致最大电力用户雷普索尔公司损失 1.7 亿欧元
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，西班牙的停电事故可能导致石油生产商雷普索尔公司（Repsol SA）的炼油厂和化工厂在上个季度蒙受了约 1.7 亿欧元（约合 2 亿美元）的损失。【原文：Spain’s power outages probably cost oil producer Repsol SA about €170 million ($200 million) in losses at refineries and chemical plants last quarter, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 停电导致西班牙上半年天然气用量猛增 41
item.description: 今年上半年，西班牙用于发电的天然气消耗量飙升了 41%，在 4 月份全国大停电之后，电网严重依赖化石燃料来稳定国家的电力网络。【原文：Spain’s gas consumption for electricity generation soared 41% in the first half of the year, with the power grid relying heavily on the fossil fuel to stabilize the country’s power network in the wake of a nationwide blackout in April.】

item.title: 期权发出信号：美元强势正在消退，风险正在积聚
item.description: 货币期权市场发出信号，美元将再次承压，而进入八月后，一波风险浪潮可能会对美元造成压力。【原文：Currency options markets are signaling the dollar will come under renewed pressure, just as a wave of risks threatens to weigh on the greenback heading into August.】

item.title: 英国购物者因食品价格上涨面临额外 275 英镑的杂货账单
item.description: 截至 7 月中旬的四周内，英国食品通胀率略有上升，因为购物者在结账时开始感受到更大的食品账单负担。【原文：UK food inflation nudged higher in the four weeks to mid-July as shoppers start to feel the burden of bigger grocery bills at the checkout.】

item.title: 交易商关注需求，欧洲天然气在连续三天下跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 欧洲天然气在连续三天下滑后得到喘息，交易商对全球各地的需求洼地进行了评估，这些洼地可能对欧洲大陆储备燃料的努力构成挑战。【原文：European natural gas took a breather after a three-day slide, with traders assessing demand pockets across the globe that could challenge the continent’s efforts to stockpile the fuel.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯拉瓦比公司聘请 Alvarez & Marsal 公司进行战略审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的拉瓦比控股公司（Rawabi Holding）是一家规模庞大的企业集团，业务涉及能源、工业服务和房地产等领域，该公司正与 Alvarez & Marsal 公司合作进行战略审查。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Rawabi Holding, a sprawling conglomerate with interests spanning energy, industrial services and real estate, is working with Alvarez & Marsal on a strategic review, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 石油托运人和交易商远离受欧盟制裁的纳亚拉能源公司
item.description: 在最新一轮欧盟制裁中，印度炼油企业纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）被单列出来，船东和石油贸易商纷纷远离这家由俄罗斯支持的企业，这是印度炼油企业面临的后果之一。【原文：Shipowners and oil traders are staying away from Russia-backed Nayara Energy Ltd. as part of the fallout faced by the Indian refiner, after it was singled out in the latest round of European Union sanctions.】

item.title: 据说日本央行认为大选对利率立场影响不大
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员认为，在首相石破茂最近一次选举受挫后，他们几乎没有必要改变逐步提高利率的政策立场。【原文：Bank of Japan officials see little need to shift their policy stance of gradually raising interest rates in the wake of Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s latest election setback, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 百事可乐股东出售全部股份筹资 15 亿美元
item.description: Ibex 投资控股有限公司（前身为 Steinhoff International）通过出售其在非洲最大的服装零售商 Pepkor 控股有限公司（Pepkor Holdings Ltd. ）的股份，筹集了 266 亿兰特（15 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Ibex Investment Holdings Ltd., formerly known as Steinhoff International, raised 26.6 billion rand ($1.5 billion) by selling its stake in Africa’s largest clothing retailer, Pepkor Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 拉马福萨在南非预算案投票前撤换受指责的部长
item.description: 南非总统罢免了其陷入困境的教育部长，为本周即将提交给立法者的重要预算立法获得一个关键联盟伙伴的支持扫清了道路。【原文：South Africa’s president ousted his embattled education minister, clearing the path to secure backing from a key coalition partner for crucial budget legislation that’s set to go before lawmakers this week.】

item.title: 债务成本飙升，英国借款超过预期数十亿美元
item.description: 英国政府 6 月份的借贷情况比预测的要差，这对英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）来说是一个挫折，将引发人们对潜在的增税以支撑公共财政的猜测。【原文：UK government borrowing came in worse than forecast in June, a setback for Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves that will fan speculation over potential tax hikes to shore up the public finances.】

item.title: 据说凯雷将斥资 4 亿美元收购 IT 公司 Adastra
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is buying a majority stake in Adastra Group SE in a deal valuing the IT consultancy and services provider at about $400 million including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国放宽外国投资审查，重点关注水和芯片领域
item.description: 英国正在缩小围绕外国投资的国家安全制度的范围，以减轻大多数企业的负担，同时将审查重点放在最容易受到外国恶意干预的行业，包括水、半导体和关键矿产。【原文：The UK is narrowing the scope of its national security regime surrounding foreign investments to ease the burden on most businesses while focusing scrutiny on the sectors most vulnerable to malign foreign interference, including water, semiconductors and critical minerals.】

item.title: 收入增长一倍多，"永恒 "股价创历史新高
item.description: 印度电子商务平台运营商 "永恒 "有限公司（Eternal Ltd.）公布的销售额超出分析师预期，显示出其在激烈竞争中的韧性，该公司股价跳涨多达15%，创下历史新高。【原文：Eternal Ltd. shares jumped as much as 15% to touch a record high after the Indian e-commerce platform operator reported sales that beat analyst estimates, showing resiliency amid tough competition.】

item.title: 据说 Bridgepoint 将在 15 亿欧元的交易中将 Vermaat 出售给 Compass
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Bridgepoint Group Plc 将向 Compass Group Plc 出售 Vermaat Groep BV 的多数股权，该交易对这家荷兰餐饮企业的估值约为 15 亿欧元（18 亿美元）。【原文：Bridgepoint Group Plc is selling a majority stake in Vermaat Groep BV to Compass Group Plc in a transaction that values the Dutch caterer at about €1.5 billion ($1.8 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将从纪录回落，英镑走软
8 月 1 日关税最后期限临近，日美贸易谈判代表举行会谈
item.description: 在 8 月 1 日提高关税的最后期限即将到来之际，日本首席贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世周一会见了美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）。【原文：Japan’s chief trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa met with US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Monday as an Aug. 1 deadline for higher tariffs looms.】

item.title: 泰国旅游业不景气和家庭债务对其贷款人造成压力
item.description: 由于家庭债务高企、旅游业放缓和消费支出低迷，泰国银行正努力应对贷款疲软的问题，这有可能影响其今年余下时间的前景。【原文：Thailand’s banks are grappling with weak lending amid high household debt, slowing tourism and sluggish consumer spending that risk dampening their outlook for the rest of the year.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉（Mubadala）、AXA IM Prime 参股私人信贷公司 Hayfin
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，穆巴达拉投资公司（Mubadala Investment Co.【原文：Mubadala Investment Co. and AXA IM Prime are taking minority stakes in leading European private credit lender Hayfin Capital Management, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 英伟达芯片挑战者 FuriosaAI 赢得首个主要客户 LG
item.description: 位于首尔的初创公司 FuriosaAI Inc.试图设计芯片与英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：FuriosaAI Inc., the Seoul-based startup seeking to design chips to compete with Nvidia Corp., has sealed its first major contract months after rejecting an $800 million acquisition offer from Meta Platforms Inc.】

item.title: 特朗普瞄准贸易漏洞，中国对美出口七成面临风险
item.description: 据彭博经济报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普通过其贸易伙伴在全球供应链中针对中国的努力，有可能削弱中国的经济增长及其对美国的大部分出口。【原文：President Donald Trump’s effort to target China through its trading partners across global supply chains threatens to erode the country’s growth and most of its exports to the US, according to Bloomberg Economics.】
